func.title: GetSkyColor

param.name: index
param.desc: Color index in the Clonk palette.

func.desc: Returns the color of the sky. With rgb_index you can specify whether you want to determine a red (rgb_index 0), green (rgb_index 1), or a blue (rgb_index 2) fraction. index specifies the palette index of paletted sky colors (0 - 19).
